testimonials.text: Barbara is a really hardworking girl, Very talented and can do wonders
testimonials.user: Triza Oyolo, Supervisor at SpringBoard Marketing

testimonials.text: That Barbara must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired her yet. Hey you, you should hire this girl, she may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that she will be one of your best developers in no time!
